code:
DFA accepting strings with even number of 0s
States: S1 (even), S2 (odd)
Alphabet: 0, 1
Transitions: S1--0-->S2, S2--0-->S1, S1--1-->S1, S2--1-->S2
Initial: S1
Final: S1
description: fsmdot DFA: even number of zeros

code:
DFA accepting strings ending in 01
States: A, B, C
Alphabet: 0, 1
A: start, B: seen 0, C: seen 01 (final)
Transitions: A--0-->B, B--1-->C, etc.

NFA accepting strings containing substring 101
States: q0 (start), q1 (seen 1), q2 (seen 10), q3 (seen 101, final)
Non-deterministic transitions on '1' from q0
